item.title: FactPanel - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 6.5. FactPanel FactPanel displays FactItem in a HorizontalPanel as shown in figure. Figure 6.4. FactPanel FactItem is a widget with two Labels, one for text and another for value, and FactPanel holds the FactItems. Instead of UiBinder template, FactPanel and FactItem directly extends HorizontalPanel. in.fins.client.widget/FactItem.java public class FactItem extends HorizontalPanel { private Label label; private String[] matchs; private Label value; private String category; @UiConstructor public FactItem(String category, String text, String match) { this.
